Package io.github.robert_f_ruff.rules_engine

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
io.github.robert_f_ruff.rules_engine.Engine
@Service public class Engine extends Object
Given a set of criteria and a piece of data, the engine identifies which rules are applicable and executes the actions of all the applicable rules.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Robert F. Ruff
